name: vicrow
description: Vicrow - A full-stack framework with Vite, Crow C++, and Prisma

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:prisma && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:prisma: cd prisma && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make -j$(nproc)
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "frontend,prisma,backend" -c "cyan,yellow,green" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:prisma" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make -j$(nproc)
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d postgres && sleep 3 && cd prisma && npx prisma db push && npm run seed
scripts.db:ui: docker compose up -d adminer && echo 'Adminer available at http://localhost:8081'
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd prisma && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:push: cd prisma && npx prisma db push
